Structure# SubscriptionOfferView

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
struct SubscriptionOfferView<Icon, PlaceholderIcon> where Icon : View, PlaceholderIcon : View
```
